web_snippets: Lionayve is a South African based, Afro House producer. A true artist with an uncompromising devotion to his profession, Lionayve is a monument to the unifying ...
In his own words: Hailing from Seshego, Polokwane, Lionayve is a South African House producer and DJ whose journey began in 2012 with the collective Nature ...
Lionayve is a force to be reckoned with in the South African music industry, and his music is a testament to the limitless potential of electronic music.
